name: Fox Thompson (Test Build)
description:
Controls: Arrow keys. Up to jump, down to stomp. No mobile support (sorry!)

Stomp on the bad guys. Collect the goodies. Reach the flag (if you dare).

This is my first ever game. It's tiny in length, riddled with physics bugs, and little more than a practise project for scripting in C#, a vessel for sound design and demonstration of FMOD audio implementation. The music and sound assets are all my own creations, as that is my main focus as a Unity developer specialising in audio engineering and music composition.
